name: Bongo International
overview:
Bongo International, LLC was founded in 2007 to overcome the challenges associated with International Cross Border eCommerce transactions by both Consumers and Businesses. Bongo’s services provide international consumers with a US address. The address is located at their warehouse in the north east of the US. This allows consumers overseas the ability to purchase US goods, consolidate purchases, and have them shipped for international delivery. Their services provide international consumers access to the entire US retail market and makes international shipping more cost effective. Today, Bongo services 100,000 customers globally with a team spanning 3 continents, speaking 12 languages.

Additionally, Bongo helps its merchant partners transact international orders through a series of services that provide the merchant with a guarantee against fraud, multi-currency payment options, language translation, and international fulfillment. Bongo owns and operates 100% of their services enabling them to be the most flexible international solution in the marketplace. For more information, please visit http://BongoUS.com or contact the Sales Team at Sales@BongoUS.com

milestones.description: Bongo attained the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS) Level 1 Service Provider Certification. This is the highest certification level for payment data security in the eCommerce industry.
milestones.source_description: Bongo Receives Highest Level of Data Security Compliance
